title: API Testing Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix API Testing Training will enable you to master the tools and techniques of API automation from basics to a high level with real-time examples. You’ll learn the concepts including how to create collections & variables in POSTMAN, write tests for GET, PUT, PATCH, POST, DELETE requests, set up Java, Eclipse, Maven on Mac OS & Windows, and more through hands-on training sessions. This knowledge will help you to clear the API Testing certification exam.
what_will_learn: |Overview of APIs|Types of API|API testing|Requirements of Command Line Tools or scripting|Challenges of API Testing|Best Practices of API Testing|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the API Testing course?




Knowledge of basic testing concepts is enough to learn API testing.
target_students: |IT Professionals|Technology Architects|Web Services Testers|End Users|Aspirants aiming for a career in this field|

title: Apigee Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix Apigee training provides in-depth knowledge to develop APIs on the Apigee API Platform from scratch. Through hands-on projects and real-time use cases, you will explore all the core fundamentals of designing, developing, and deploying API solutions using the features of Google’s cloud Apigee Platform. Upon course completion, the skills acquired will enable you to become a certified Apigee professional.
what_will_learn: |Deploying and Running APIs on Apigee|Configuring and Managing new APIs and enforcing security with minimal impact|Creating, Managing, and Monetizing API products|Extending API Services to obtain enhanced flexibility and tailoring them according to business requirements with Python, Java, and JavaScript|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Apigee course?The professionals who want take Apigee training should possess the following skills:

Prior experience in coding with Java, JavaScript, Python or any other similar language.
An understanding of REST or SOAP Web Services
Restful API Design basics
target_students: |Middleware developers|Middleware Architects|API developers|People with API design basics|
instructor_bio: With 12+ years of experience in training and nine years of working experience, Manish is a certified professional, has trained more than 100+ students and delivered seven corporate firms with live online sessions worldwide.

title: IBM API Connect Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix provides the best IBM API Connect training with certified IBM professionals. The course provides you with in-depth knowledge of how to develop, publish, configure, and manage APIs using IBM API Connect V2018. You’ll master all the key essentials of IBM API Connect through a hands-on approach. Upon course completion, you’ll be able to apply this knowledge in real-time scenarios.
what_will_learn: |Get an overview of IBM API Connect architecture|Use API Connect toolkit to create APIs|Use the LoopBack Nodejs framework to execute APIs|Perform backup using the command line|Master the Analytics used in API Management|Monitor and manage the API Connect cloud|Create and customize the Developer Portal|

title: API Testing Using Katalon Training
description: Mindmajix API Testing Using Katalon Training course is designed to cover all aspects of API testing using Katalon Studio tool and also to provide users with the knowledge required to work with Katalon Studio tool at a professional level. This course addresses planning and performing API tests, developing the pre-test & post-test scripts using Katalon Studio, executing the API tests and generating API reports. The course covers real-world best practices for effective use of Katalon Studio tool for API testing with practical examples demonstrated.
what_will_learn: |Yeah! This certification is highly valuable as it will help gain higher salaries|API Testing certification enables you to move to higher positions thus enhancing your career growth|Today, many companies around the world are looking for certified API Testers|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the API Testing using Katalon course ?




Good understanding of:

Websites and web browser 
Client-Server architecture 
Web Services/APIs
Basic knowledge of HTTP/HTTPS
Basic understanding of HTTP methods
target_students: |IT Engineers, software developers, and project managers who want to learn API testing|A manual tester who want to switch their career to API testing|Fresher/Graduates who want to start their career in this field|
